subject: mailq flushed from bugzilla.samba.org
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Just a note:

You might see a flood of bug report emails.  I've fixed a
problem with the MTA on bugzilla.samba.org.





cheers, jerry
